narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Harris Flug is a Social Worker, Clinical provider based in Huntington, NY. From 2018-01 through 2022-06, this provider received $375K in Medicaid payments across 5K claims serving 788 beneficiaries, billing 1 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 100% of billing is concentrated in 90834 (90834), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Saw a 3.6× spike in 2021 ($11K → $38K), a sharp year-over-year increase.
